KOZAL.IS.summary: Koza Altin Isletmeleri A.S. explores and operates gold mines in Turkey. It owns interests in the Ovacik, Mastra, Cukuralan Kaymaz, Himmetdede, Coraklik, and Kubaslar gold mines, as well as Mollakara project. The company is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

KOZAY.summary: Koza Altin Isletmeleri A.S. explores and operates gold mines in Turkey. It owns interests in the Ovacik, Mastra, Cukuralan Kaymaz, Himmetdede, Coraklik, and Kubaslar gold mines, as well as Mollakara project. The company is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.
